docs.text: Getting started YOCO is a minimalistic YAML-based configuration system for Python. Installation Run pip install yoco to install the latest release of YOCO.
docs.title: Getting started

docs.text: YOCO is a minimalistic YAML-based configuration system for Python.
docs.title: Getting started

docs.text: Run pip install yoco to install the latest release of YOCO.
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: API Reference yoco This module contains all YOCO functions to load and save configurations. YOCO is based on Python dictionaries and YAML files to provide a simple, yet powerful way of configuring Python projects. YOCO supports specifying parameters through the command line, YAML-files or directly from a Python dictionary.
docs.title: API Reference
